name: litedom
author: Mardix
description: A blazing fast view library to create Web Components and use Javascript Template Literals in HTML

scripts.build-i: npm run build && npm run size
scripts.commit-publish-tag: cross-var git commit -am '$npm_package_version' && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish-pkg: cross-var npm run test && npm run build && npm run commit-publish-tag && npm publish && npm run size
scripts.test-publish-pkg: cross-var npm run test && npm run build && npm run commit-publish-tag && npm run size
